name: regive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give something again: Over the decades, these stories continue to regive pleasure and enjoyment. If your child spits out a medication, do not re-give it unless directed to by a doctor.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's annoying when you have to punch in your number, only to be forced to re-give it to the person on the phone.She gets Christmas presents and thinks, "Who can I re-give this to?"If you give service to your neighbour, he or she will also regive you equal service.
